page.title: 02LIVING IN BROUGHTON
page.content: AT LUNCHTIME ON FRIDAY,5th JULY WE WENT TO THE HIGH STREET AND INTERVIEWED PASSERS-BY WHO LIVE IN BROUGHTON.WE MET FOUR DIFFERENT PEOPLE.THEY HAD LIVED HERE FOR BETWEEN 21 YEARS TO 81 YEARS.MOST PEOPLE WERE BORN HERE AND ONE PERSON MOVED HERE FOR A CHANGE.THEY SAID THEY LIKED BROUGHTON BECAUSE IT IS COMPACT,FRIENDLY,QUIET AND HAS LOVELY COUNTRY-SIDE AROUND IT. ONE PERSON SAID IT NEEDED A CHEMIST AND THE OTHERS SAID THEY DID NOT DISLIKE ANYTHING ABOUT BROUGHTON. EVERYBODY SAID THEY WERE GLAD THE BYPASS WAS BUILT.THEY SAID THE BYPASS MADE THE ROADS SAFER.THEY SAID THAT THEY DO NOT WANT ANY CHANGES IN BROUGHTON.THEY SAID THEY KNEW NOBODY WHO HAD MOVED OUT OF BROUGHTON THOUGH THEY THOUGHT THAT IF SOMEONE DID MOVE IT WOULD PROBABLY BE FOR WORK.
